mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY NOTICE_NO ASC) "RNUM", NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CATEGORY FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO > 0 ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
SELECT FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_NO > 0 ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CATEGORY, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS NOTICE_WRITE_DATE, NOTICE_CONTENT FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO > 0 AND NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
